game.name: TitTok 3
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: TitTok 3: FINAL CHAPTER. An adventurous 2D puzzle-platformer with Cats, explosions, portals and deadly lasers! An epic conclusion to the enchanting trilogy. TikTok ≠ TitTok
game.shortDescriptionEn: TitTok 3: FINAL CHAPTER. An adventurous 2D puzzle-platformer with Cats, explosions, portals and deadly lasers! An epic conclusion to the enchanting trilogy. TikTok ≠ TitTok

reviewHighlights.text: TitTok 3, developed and published by Siberian Mouse, continues the studio’s increasingly recognizable approach to adult casual games—compact, humor-dr...
